I just started playing The Shadow Sun  and I'm truly impressed. Right from the start, you know you're dealing with a true, original, modern, story-based medieval fantasy RPG experience in the Elder Scrolls, Neverwinter Nights, Witcher and Dragon Age: Origins style: -Extensive (but not excessive) character customization, skill trees, spells, etc. -Real inventory system -Cutscenes -Original epic storyline -Dialogue trees -Companions and NPCs -3D camera -Area maps -Journal/Quest log -Great graphics -Clean, efficient interface -Even loadscreen tips!  And it plays beautifully on my 3 y-old Samsung S2 phone!  Just wow! Now that Ossian has developped this great engine, I hope this means we'll see many more original,. story-based RPG adventures coming out in the future on Android.

I love this game - it is designed for mobile by a company with a deep and rich history working on some of the greatest RPGs in history with Bioware.  You won't be getting something as sprawling as Baldur's Gate ... but you also won't be disappointed!
